title: 印度尼西亚“有条件”取消 Grok 轮胎
content: 继马来西亚和菲律宾之后，印度尼西亚也解除了对 xAI 聊天机器人 Grok 的禁令。
original_content: Indonesia has followed Malaysia and the Philippines in lifting a ban on xAI’s chatbot Grok.

title: OpenClaw 的人工智能助手正在构建自己的社交网络
content: 病毒式个人人工智能助手（以前称为 Clawdbot）又换了新外壳。在短暂更名为 Moltbot 后，它现在选择 OpenClaw 作为新名称。
original_title: OpenClaw’s AI assistants are now building their own social network
original_content: The viral personal AI assistant formerly known as Clawdbot has a new shell — again. After briefly rebranding as Moltbot, it has now picked OpenClaw as its new name.

title: 介绍用于高级机器人控制的 NVIDIA Cosmos 策略
original_title: Introducing NVIDIA Cosmos Policy for Advanced Robot Control

title: Show HN：NanoClaw – “Clawdbot”在 500 行 TS 中与 Apple 容器隔离
original_title: Show HN: NanoClaw – “Clawdbot” in 500 lines of TS with Apple container isolation

title: 人工智能代理迅速崛起 eBay 禁止非法自动化购物
content: 新政策要求“为我购买”人工智能工具和聊天机器人在访问平台之前必须获得许可。
original_title: eBay bans illicit automated shopping amid rapid rise of AI agents
original_content: New policy requires "buy for me" AI tools and chatbots to obtain permission before accessing the platform.

title: 我们对自主 OpenClaw 代理进行了现场红队与蓝队测试 [R]
content: 我们最近在两个基于 OpenClaw 构建的自主人工智能代理之间进行了受控对抗安全测试。一名特工被明确配置为红队攻击者。一名特工担任标准后卫
original_title: We ran a live red-team vs blue-team test on autonomous OpenClaw agents [R]
original_content: We recently ran a controlled adversarial security test between two autonomous AI agents built on OpenClaw. One agent was explicitly configured as a red-team attacker. One agent acted as a standard def

title: DevDay 发布的 AMA
content: 这是历史上成为建设者的最好时代。在 DevDay 2025 上，我们推出了下一代工具和模型，以帮助开发人员更快地编码、更可靠地构建代理并扩展他们的应用程序
original_content: Its the best time in history to be a builder. At DevDay 2025, we introduced the next generation of tools and models to help developers code faster, build agents more reliably, and scale their apps in

title: Nvidia 首席执行官反驳有关其公司 100B 美元 OpenAI 投资已陷入停滞的报道
content: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋表示，最近有关其公司与 OpenAI 之间摩擦的报道是“无稽之谈”。
original_title: Nvidia CEO pushes back against report that his company’s $100B OpenAI investment has stalled
original_content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said that a recent report of friction between his company and OpenAI was “nonsense.”

title: 据报道，埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 旗下的 SpaceX、特斯拉和 xAI 正在洽谈合并事宜
content: 此次合并将把 Grok 聊天机器人、Starlink 卫星和 SpaceX 火箭合并到一家公司旗下。
original_title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI in talks to merge, according to reports
original_content: This merger would bring the Grok chatbot, Starlink satellites, and SpaceX rockets together under one corporation.

title: 据报道亚马逊正在洽谈向 OpenAI 投资 500 亿美元
content: 如果交易得以实现，这将意味着亚马逊将支持其他初创公司争夺人工智能霸主地位。
original_title: Amazon is reportedly in talks to invest $50B in OpenAI
original_content: If a deal materializes, it would mean Amazon is backing competing startups in the race for AI supremacy.
